scripts.dev: echo 'Starting all services...' && bun --env-file=.env run dev:api & bun --env-file=.env run dev:ui & bun --env-file=.env run dev:worker
scripts.build: bun run --filter '@devcenter/shared' build && bun run --filter '@devcenter/ui' build && bun run --filter '@devcenter/api' build
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production bun --env-file=.env run --filter '@devcenter/api' start & bun --env-file=.env run --filter '@devcenter/worker' start
